Name: Demons Crusher
About the game: Gothic Middle Ages, you are a descendant of a noble vampire. A plague has attacked the city and the undead have risen from hell. Get to the abandoned temple and find the remains of your ancestor, this will put an end to the madness. The game contains puzzle elements, find the lever that will open the door or call the boatman. You are waiting for 3 locations with different types of enemies on them. Enemies differ in health and behavior. Peculiarities -beautiful graphics - gamepad support -different types of enemies - quest items
